attributes.action: Reward Jean Bishop, Hulls Bee Lady, for her efforts in raising money for Age UK.
attributes.background:
Mrs Bishop tirelessly dresses in a 'Bee' outfit and stands all day collecting money for the charity, Age UK.
She has won a pride of Britain award and has been made a Freeman of the City of Hull.
She has enthusiastically raised over £100,000 over more than 20yrs

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we think you're asking for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
